《源自古英语“分配”的意思》(dealt[d[lt; delt])

及物动词
1 分配
a. 分配,分给
Mother dealt (out) three candies each.
母亲分给每个人三粒糖果
A judge ~s (out) justice.
法官主持正义
The money was not dealt out fairly.
那笔钱分摊 [分配] 不均
b. 把…分给<某人>,分配; 把…分给[某人],分配[to]
She dealt (out) each child three sandwiches. = She dealt three sandwiches (out) to each child.
她分给每个孩子三个三明治
2 a. 发<纸牌>
D~ the cards.
发牌吧
b. 发<纸牌>给<某人>; 发<纸牌>给[某人][to]
He dealt each player four cards. = He dealt four cards to each player.
他发给 (玩牌者) 每人四张牌
3 给与<某人><打击>; 给与[某人]<打击>[to, at]
~ a person a blow= ~ a blow to a person

a. <人>处理 [问题、某人] ,应付,对付[with]

c. (口语) [把人] 杀死,干掉[with]

I have been well [badly] dealt with [by].

3
a. 经营[商品],买卖,交易[in]
The merchant ~s in wool and cotton.

b. 交易[with]

c. 交易[at, with]
